sentence: The staff is super helpful the rooms spotless and do not forget to partake in the wine tastings
Super comfy and great service
Excellent Location Very friendly and Helpful staff This definately will be my choice Hotel when Staying in San Fran
Staff were all very helpful and friendly and free tea and coffee in the lobby in the morning was a nice touch
Wine reception is a great way to meet fellow travellers
The bell staff that double as doormen were the best
The service was great especially from JESICA at reception
Great location clean rooms nice staff
hotel employees were super nice and made us all happy after a LONG day of travelingYou had to pay for any extras but I guess that is what you get in a big city
Overall the staff were very pleasant and welcoming
The staff was as accommodating as they could be under the circumstances
We turned around and went right to the front desk
The staff was pretty nice but offered no compassion that no one notified us of this
Staff are trying manfully to cope with disgruntled guests
The staff were as helpful as they could be under the circumstances

it is a huge let down walking into the lobby or the adjacent corridors and finding plastic sheeting and the very pleasant staff just stuck at desks in the middle but visually as a welcome it is hopeless
This hotel was under renovation and the reception area and elevators were
The desk staff was pleasant but you got the distinct impression that not much could be done except to apologize profusely
The hotel was undergoing renovations during our stay but the check in staff was wonderful
However reception staff were friendly and efficient despite themselves being surrounded by plastic sheeting and construction workers
When we checked into the hotel the staff did not mention an urban utilities fee
The front desk service we received was poor
Room service is only breakfast and ends at 1030
When we first got to our room and found that out I called the desk but the man who answered said that all of those types of rooms were like that and there was nothing else
When we arrived at the passport control desk 3 hours later we were asked what is the purpose of your visit
I was informed that was a room service feature and I would have to order it through them

We were n’t comfortable parking the vehicle there given what the staff was saying so we asked for a voucher for a future date or a discount given the lack of safety around their hotel and they said they could n’t do anything given it was past the 48hour cancellation policy
Not only did the staff not appear very helpful the night staff acted as if we were a bother and the day staff was very brisk in getting rid of us
And on top of that they charge you for phone use within California and booking service comes along with hidden cost book yourself is cheaper
The front desk held our luggage as we arrived way before check in time however they had a room ready much earlier than we expected also
